title: Italian Doughnuts (Sfingi)
ingredients: ['450g ricotta cheese', '2 eggs', '2 tablespoons caster sugar', '1 1/2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '1 1/2 tablespoons baking powder', '125g plain flour, divided', '2 litres vegetable oil for frying', '4 tablespoons honey', '4 tablespoons icing sugar for dusting']
